summary: This file defines a Vue component named 'ContactActions' which provides functionality for copying an email address to the clipboard and sending an email via the user's default email client. It also includes social media icons.
functionality: The main functionality includes copying an email address to the clipboard with a tooltip notification and opening a mailto link to send an email. It also displays social media icons.
relationships: It imports and uses the 'SocialIcon' component to display social media icons.
It uses the 'linkden.svg' asset for one of the social media icons.
It might be used in a larger contact form or section of the project where contact information is displayed.

identified_relationships.description: ContactActions component references the SocialIcon component to display social media icons.
ContactActions component uses SVG files for social media icons, which are likely located in the assets directory.
ContactActions component imports a utility function from clipboard.js to handle copying email addresses to the clipboard.
ContactActions component imports a utility function from email.js to handle sending emails via the user's default email client.
ContactActions component uses global styles defined in global.css for styling purposes.
